title: ZZX-Core
blurb: Portable container + GUI system that hosts all web server backends: reverse proxy, TLS, data, queues, observability, and app runtimes.
description: ZZX-Core is a server stack and GUI that standardizes how we run backends across laptops, dev servers, and production. It generates Docker Compose bundles, .env secrets, systemd units, and sample proxy configs. Choose your reverse proxy (Traefik, Caddy, Nginx), toggle runtimes (Node, Python/Uvicorn, Go, PHP-FPM, static), and add data/queues (Postgres, Redis, MinIO, RabbitMQ) and observability (Prometheus, Grafana, Loki, Tempo, cAdvisor). The goal: strong defaults, quick iteration, and safe rollbacks.

versions.notes: Compose generator with Traefik/Caddy/Nginx options; observability presets.
Runtimes and data layer toggles; .env generator.
